Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."PAC_FRC_POST_SAVE_FORECAST_SP" ( PROJECT_ID NUMBER, REVISION_NO NUMBER, P_FORECAST_TYPE NUMBER, P_DETAIL_ID NUMBER, P_PERIOD_ID NUMBER, UNITS NUMBER, COST NUMBER, REVENUE NUMBER, CURRENCY_CODE VARCHAR2, RESOURCE_CODE NUMBER, ACTUAL_BENEFITS NUMBER, P_DETAIL2_ID NUMBER DEFAULT NULL ) IS tmpVar NUMBER; BEGIN -- dummy variable. tmpVar := 0; EXCEPTION WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN Null; WHEN OTHERS THEN -- Consider logging the error and then re-raise RAISE; END PAC_FRC_POST_SAVE_FORECAST_SP;
